EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2017-06-13-Pure//Accelerate Dinner.EMAIL-Invite-Pure//Accelerate-Account Own
EmailTemplate.subject: Join Me for a Bay-Side Seafood Dinner 6/13 at Pure//Accelerate
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Are you going to Pure//Accelerate in San Francisco? If so, we’d love if you could join us for dinner so we can get to know our community even better!
After the Hall Crawl on Tuesday, June 13th, we will be heading over to Mission Rock Resort for a bay-side seafood dinner. If you are planning to attend the conference, or simply will be in the San Francisco area, and are interested in joining us for dinner at 7:30pm, RSVP here <[[https://turbonomic.com/pure-accelerate-turbonomic-dinner%20/]]>.
While you’re there, don’t forget to stop by our booth to learn more about Turbonomic’s partnership with Pure Storage, and get a sneak-peek at our brand-new user interface and upcoming product release.
I hope to see you in there!
Best, Steve
Steve Corndell
General Manager and Vice President Commercial Sales, Americas Email: steve.corndell@turbonomic.com <[[mailto:steve.corndell@turbonomic.com]]> Cell: 774-273-0056 Office: 781-418-5232
